website_summaries.verdict: If you are concerned about making an eco-friendly purchase, this set is worth considering in spite of a few quality concerns.
pros: A top choice for the environmentally-conscious makeup enthusiast – vegan, cruelty-free, and tree-free packaging
Pack of 2 (applicator and mini detail blender)
cons: The smaller blender is somewhat stiff and harsh on the skin, while the larger applicator tends to fall apart when washed frequently

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I had high expectations for these sponges and I'm totally satisfied with the way they apply products. The thing is the quality of the sponges are very disappointing, my bigger sponge has a lot of rips on and its been less than 2 months since I've purchased these. I don't recommend anyone to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like the original for some reason.
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this. These are so hard even when you wet them. They are not like the original Ecotools blender. The foam is much more coarse and do not get as big with they are damp. I will not use these on any client of mine. I would say stick with the original. DO NOT BUY THIS!!!! It's not the seller because I got my other Ecotools blend from them and that was just fine. I have no idea why these is so different from the original.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: WAY better then the Beauty Blender!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great find! I have the Beauty Blender and I HATE how expensive it is . . . mine is well worn so was looking for a cheaper alternative and I TOTALLY found it, x2!!! These work great wet or dry (a BIG bonus!!!) and clean up nicely (I use Dr. Brommer's bar soap and it works great). I actually prefer it as it has this fabulous flat end that works great for blending and really applying foundation smoothly. Save your money and get this, its a wonderful set!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schroen

customer_reviews.title: Great applicator
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Ecotools Foam Applicator. The first one worked out very well for me lasting me over a year with proper care. Foam is very soft and has two sides to help apply better, one side is flat while the other is round. The foam does not soak up too much foundation nor waste any foundation. This brush works great for under eye concealer and overall foundation blending. Its easy to use and a good size as well. I recommend this brush to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Garza

customer_reviews.title: I love these sponges
customer_reviews.text: I love these sponges. Much more firm than the original Beauty Blender, but that's not necessarily a bad thing. My first one lasted for about 7 months with rotational use (longer than you are supposed to keep it, but meh. My life.) I was it regularly with the black Beauty Blender solid cleanser, and it came clean every time. This time, I went back for the 2-in-1 box, since it came with a smaller, Beauty Blender-sized one. I will be ordering again. In case you are curious, I have this in a rotation with my black Beauty Blender, and I plan on reordering both since I use each of them for different products.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bambino

customer_reviews.title: Save your money ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't always like to wet my sponges because I'm in a hurry , when i got this product i was disappointed the sponges ARE NOT squishy or soft 🙄 I tried applying concealer with them & they absorbed all of it & I had nothing to work with . This was my first time buying anything from this brand & probably the last ... I own 2 beauty blenders from E.l.f & i never see myself wetting them because they have that bounce to them I'm saying that so you guys know what what works best for me .
customer_reviews.author: Rubie

customer_reviews.title: My go to makeup sponge
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite makeup sponges. They are a bit firmer than the beauty blender but what I love is the shape. The sponges have a flat side that really helps blending out the makeup. Also I find the texture does not soak up an excessive amount of product, like other sponges on the market. I use the large sponge for all over liquid foundation application. I love the small one for concealer and setting the under eyes with powder. The straight edge allows me to really get up to the lower lash line! I love this product and have already repurchased.
customer_reviews.author: Corey B

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a reusable beauty blender in the shape of a cosmetic sponge because I love the edges it makes it easy to manipulate concealer. I didn't wanna keep using the cosmetic sponges though because they're not reusable and I would like to cut down on waste. I found this and was really happy. The light green sponge is closer to the size of a normal cosmetic sponge if anyone was wondering. I like how this sponge is eco friendly as well and is about 2.50 USD per sponge which makes it sooo much more affordable compared to the 20 USD beauty blender.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: I’m a brush user, but now I use this for foundation.
customer_reviews.text: It gets into the tiny corners around the nose and eyes really well... the shape is perfect for any application with foundation. I admit, I use it for my primer too. I don’t see as much sponge stealing the product, as my other makeup sponges/blenders. It looks denser. So I use it dry. It’s on the small side, but that’s another part of why it works so well. Overall, it was worth the try and I’ve ended up liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Cultrangel

customer_reviews.title: Makeup looks flawless.
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t know what to expect from these. I’d never used a “beauty blender” before but needed a new makeup sponge. These were inexpensive and I knew EcoTools made a quality product. I’m SO impressed by these. They make my makeup look flawless. I love the two different sizes and they different “sides” to each of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rkgarringer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as my Beauty Blender at a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I actually spent $20 on one Beauty Blender sponge after I got these EcoTools Perfecting Blender Duo sponges for a fraction of the cost--and they work just as well if not better! What was I thinking? These sponges are GREAT! I use the small one for under my eyes and concealer and the large one for foundation. They are soft, so easy to clean and blend beautifully. I will be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: Flashpoint

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile buy!
customer_reviews.text: The big green sponge that comes in the package is the worthwhile one. The small light green seems too dense and I can’t spread product as evenly as I can with the big green sponge. Regardless, I think this is a worthwhile buy just for the dark green sponge on its own - I feel like it is nice and soft but does not soak up as much makeup as the real techniques sponges.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J

customer_reviews.title: Soaks up product, not firm enough for me
customer_reviews.text: Sponge soaks up a lot of product, I think because it is very absorbent so it holds on to water. Compared to the beauty blender, it does not do as good of a job, but for the price, it is pretty reasonable. I would not purchase again, but if you want a cheap and sufficient sponge, this will do well enough.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Switch NOW!
customer_reviews.text: These sponges are amazing. I have switched completely from Real Techniques. These feel identical but with the small flat side on the top, it is so much easier to get foundation and concealer under my eyes and around my nose. The large flat side is great for powder and the small flat side is what I use to apply my foundation. I smooth everything out with the rounded edge. I love these sponges, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Ecotools Foam Sponge Duo
customer_reviews.text: These two sponges allow cream foundation to go on my face smoothly. The contour of each sponge fits my facial contour and easily smooth the makeup in all areas of the face and neck. I have used many different shaped sponges and found these are the best for my face and neck. I always smooth the sponge over my neck so there is no line of demarcation. The best price I have found is $7.15 and sold on Amazon. I absolutely recommend these sponges
customer_reviews.author: Coco47

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed with this brush. I thought I would like a blender brush with a handle, but I found that it is extremely difficult to control and doesn't do the job like a normal blender brush. I mean the quality is good, it's just not a product that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Least favorite sponge I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I had the gray ecotools sponge and liked it. These are different. They are pretty dense and stiff and haven't softened up at all over 4 washes and numerous uses. Also, when I get it wet and squeeze out excess water before applying makeup, within 5 mins it's almost dry again. It's not a terrible product, but probably my least favorite beauty sponge ever used. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M

customer_reviews.title: Soaks up foundation and not very soft.
customer_reviews.text: It's so so. Not great, but not terrible. For the price, it's good. I purchased two, but won't be purchasing again. There are definitely better blending sponges 🧽 on the market. It's definitely more firm than soft
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The larger dark green sponge is awesome only thing is it doesnt absorb much water so youll have to blend quickly or your makeup will start to get patchy. The smaller Light green sponge is hard. I dont even use it ****** I have to go over my inner eye corners and re apply my concealer bc the sponge doesn’t really hug the face the way the traditional teardrops shaped beauty blender does.
customer_reviews.author: BeAnna Davis

customer_reviews.title: Way better than BeautyBlender!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sponges so much. The straight edge blends my under eye concealer perfectly. I soak the sponge 5/6 hours before use (overnight) and it’s perfectly squishy in the morning without excess water. I’ve bought this once and am still using it (LASTS SO LONG!) Also, I have the actual beauty blender and I do prefer this over that sponge
customer_reviews.author: ANC01

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand of sponge so far!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite beauty sponge so far. Both sizes work great for different parts of my makeup routine. They wash easily and I haven't had any issues of them tearin like some other brands I have used. The large one is very soft and the smaller is a little firmer but by no means is it hard. I like the variety of the firmness because it make the pair more versatile to use for different blending techniques. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kmiller

customer_reviews.title: THE best sponges!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a brush, and it left lines all over my face. I use both of these sponges every day. I make them damp, use the dark one to apply liquid foundation, and then use the light one to apply undereye concealer! I have washed them a couple of times and they're like new. I think these work much better than the RealTechniques orange sponge. I have never tried the beautyblender, but I don't know that it could top this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best sponges that I have used. They are great quality and I really good price. I use the large one in this pack all over my face and the smaller lighter green color is good when placing concealer around your nose and under your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Noel Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I've never used beauty blenders before but I stumbled upon this one by accident and all I can say is, "Wow! Where have you been all my life??" I've used my fingers, foundation brushes, regular sponges before but this gives me a PERFECT complexion and cuts down my application time in half! Bouncing motion is key to the perfect flawless finish. I only use the large one though as I found the small one to be a bit too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good brand, good thing to buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift, but they seem to be holding up well. I think they're a good quality too, but I can't compare them to anything. Buy these on Amazon. They're about half the price of what stores are selling them and they arrive quickly.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: It’s not super soft. It doesn’t clean easily and when you do clean it, it rips off of the brush handle. It also sucks up my foundation a lot, so it wastes product. Gave up on using this for an Aesthetica blending sponge, which is much better, and a lot cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but kind of difficult to use with product. The sponge needs to be just a bit more forgiving or maybe a tad bit bigger. I was able to complete my look, but it took a lot of patience with this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product! Much better than any expensive brush
customer_reviews.text: These sponges do the job! I am picky, and when I say I am picky this is no joke. I have gone through every brush, every other sponge, and this is by far the best applicator I've found yet. I use the big one to apply foundation and the smaller one for concealer. Very simple, quick, and applies very nice for such a cheap buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just MEH
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it much. Didn't stay firm enough to give enough pressure, wanted more density I think and a less flexible mounting and something to glide easier Also!!! Miffed that I received an ugly grey one
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: LOVEE the quality and softness of these sponges but I would love if the big sponge was a tad smaller! It’s huge! So I keep buying the bundle mostly for the small one cause it’s perfect but anyways, still love these.
customer_reviews.author: Majo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I’ve been on the hunt for a sponge that is more affordable than the beauty blender but comparable in quality. This doesn’t disappoint. I love it and will definitely purchase more. I’ve been using it for a few months now and have had no issues with it. Definitely recommend and you can’t beat the price. :)
customer_reviews.author: Azalea Meza

customer_reviews.title: Big one rocks, small one is a bummer
customer_reviews.text: The large sponge is perfectly soft and bouncy, I use it every single day. I don’t use the small one though, it feels much different from the big one. Not nearly as soft or bouncy and was actually smudging my under eye concealer rather than blending. I threw the small one away, but the big one is my jam.
customer_reviews.author: Lola L

customer_reviews.title: Best beauty sponge! Most ideal cut!
customer_reviews.text: The best sponge I've ever used! Absorbent and applies liquid foundation nicely and evenly. I especially love the shape. The two flat surfaces apply makeup nicely to the bigger and smaller areas of face, and the little blunt edge reaches into the sides of the nose very well. I don't want to waste money any other sponges anymore!
customer_reviews.author: fandifandi

customer_reviews.title: Better then high end sponges
customer_reviews.text: I use to purchase these at Target, but now knowing they are available on Amazon is where I purchase now. I ordered the high end beauty blender and quickly returned using Eco tools sponges. Holds up wonderfully and cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: K.A San Diego

customer_reviews.title: better than the beauty blender
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender. It does not absorb any of your products after it's been dampened so it is a dream to work with. Everything blends effortlessly. I have repurchased this several times and will not stop anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nooo
customer_reviews.text: These are a big NOPE. Compared to read techniques, this is a flop. Hard to blend with.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Steelo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The previous beauty blender I had purchased I could never get all the way clean. These are perfect. The right size and shape for applying foundation and concealer and a breeze to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Book Diva

customer_reviews.title: dense
customer_reviews.text: not a fan these don't get soft or bouncy when you wet them they just stay kind of stiff. The flat sides make they better for sliding along the face rather than blotting into the face like typical beauty sponges.
customer_reviews.author: Annisa

customer_reviews.title: flawless! Value!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I’ve been applying foundation and concealer wrong my entire life. This leaves you with a FLAWLESS I mean airbrushed/photoshop finish. This was an incredible price for a reliable brand and two sponges!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this. I love how there is a handle on the sponge. It’s very soft and perfect size. I bought this to blend under eye concealer and I am able to get in small corners
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: damaged sponge after wash
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this sponge. I had high hopes but sadly i have to discontinue using the sponge. Eco tools i only applied makeup thrice using your product and after my first wash,the sponge was torn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite beauty blender
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite beauty blenders. They are soft, relatively easy to clean, and they just are so easy to work with. I use them for liguid/cream as well as powders.
customer_reviews.author: Meg07201126

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blender. I mostly use the larger one because the small one is very firm, and I'm not sure what applications that would be good for. I am happy with the quality and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to wash!
customer_reviews.text: I love these beauty sponges! They’re my absolute favorite. I love how it’s big enough to apply my foundation in a short amount of time. It’s easy to wash and lasts a long time. I’ve used my everyday for about a month now and it’s still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great dense blenders
customer_reviews.text: I love these blenders. They are dense enough to not absorb all your foundation and spread it nicely. They don’t have the funny smell some of the other brands have. This is my second order.
customer_reviews.author: Patti D

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend using this damp, but it works great, and even better it keeps your hands clean unlike other applicator sponges .
customer_reviews.author: Not your Neuro-Typical family

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter and she loves it! She just started wearing makeup it works and helps blend her foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Webb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beauty tool!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best between a foundation brush and a beauty blender! Works beautifully to apply foundation and isn’t as messy as a beauty blender because of the handle. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I had mine for 2 months, I would say I use it 5-6 times a week. It is holding up well, only got some minimal tears so far
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: The Darker Ones Are Great
customer_reviews.text: I dig the dark green one. It’s great! Spongy and blends pretty well but the smaller one is NOT great. It’s far to dense even when dampened.
customer_reviews.author: ble

customer_reviews.title: Blends Amazing (especially when damp)
customer_reviews.text: When the big one is damp, it gets so soft and amazing. Eco tools beauty blender has made me love beauty blenders (I've never really liked beauty blenders but decided to give this one a try). Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Martin

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Great sponges until you wash them.... then they start to fall apart. Only had these about 2 weeks maybe washed in the eco tools cleaning soap and the big green one started to fall apart. These sponges are great at flawlessly applying makeup but didn’t last very long. Super disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Small green one works well!
customer_reviews.text: I only use the small green one. It is really nice and does its job. The big one is too spongy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: My goto
customer_reviews.text: These were a great find. The flat edge with two different sizes on either side was exactly what I was looking for. And I was searching for this particular shape all over the internet so pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Adonas Cary

customer_reviews.title: multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I actually bought to apply a cream medication and it works great. Helps keep my hands clean.
customer_reviews.author: momin08

customer_reviews.title: Like it! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I like it nothing fancy but who needs fancy. It does the job and I mainly like having something so I don't have to really touch my face with my fingers!
customer_reviews.author: Charity Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Blends Beautifully and Easy to Use, BUT Tears Very Easily
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the softest sponge blenders I've ever used before, and the shape is unique and great, but the biggest complaint I would have is it tears really easily, after the first use it ripped at the tip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beauty blenders
customer_reviews.text: Great and affordable and easy to use. Can't have too many of these. I find these are pretty soft and easy to use. Blend well.
customer_reviews.author: Kielha

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and impressive
customer_reviews.text: These are great sponges. More affordable then the well known orange ones from the drug store and the more expensive brand as well. Very impressed with these. Easily to clean, they last awhile, good coverage, makes blending easier. Will definitely be repurchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylinn

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes them but it’s nothing like the original beauty blender. Would recommend getting a higher quality
customer_reviews.author: Kristel

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN THE ORIGINAL BEAUTY BLENDER
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE THE BEST SPONGES EVER! They’re very soft and are easy to clean (I like to use Cetaphil’s cleanser). Two sponges for $4-5 is a huge bargain, so I really recommend purchasing Ecotool’s sponges. Personally, I like to use the bigger sponge for foundation and concealer and the small sponge for powder. Both works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: fallingcats

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly how it looks
customer_reviews.text: Helps for concealer... not good for full face cause it’s smaller then a regular blending sponge
customer_reviews.author: MMA Wall

customer_reviews.title: I love them so much I bought my daughter one too
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd of these. I love them so much I bought my daughter one too. My liquid foundation goes on so smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Cariblee

customer_reviews.title: Echo Tools Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of Echo Tool beauty sponge & how it feel on my face when applying makeup. I'll reorder more sponges to always have available.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Good sponges like it very much and the best replacement for the beauty blender so far but in a better cut
customer_reviews.author: Bashayer

customer_reviews.title: I usually love ecoTools brushes
customer_reviews.text: I usually love ecoTools brushes. But this one is not what I expected. Its supper hard and not even the least bit flexible. I literally TRIED to use it once and put it down not even 5 secs later. Im pretty sure mine is going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Esquilita

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of sponges
customer_reviews.text: So far these sponges feel great, they're so smooth when new, wish the makeup wrung out more but they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than real technique and beauty blender and in my opinion works just as good, but I don't think it gets quite as big as beauty blender does when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Webster

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok
customer_reviews.text: These don’t absorb any product which is good to get the most out of your product, but I think it makes it difficult to fully blend prices
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like that this came with two different sizes. Perfect for applying makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Rheeza Mañalac

customer_reviews.title: but I don't really use cream contour or concealer (but I think that this would be great for concealer)
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure I needed the smaller sponge for the way I use makeup, but I don't really use cream contour or concealer (but I think that this would be great for concealer). The larger sponge is quite nice and works well with the foundations I use.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Ricker

customer_reviews.title: Buy these now!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome some of the best ones I have bought works as good as the expensive ones
customer_reviews.author: Sammie & Steve

customer_reviews.title: which is in great condition btw
customer_reviews.text: I reduced it to 3 stars because it already show signs of tearing. .. haven't even had it 3months and I alternate with a regular sponge... which is in great condition btw. Love the shape still use it but it wore out pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Racquel D

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, shipping was fast, and the price is beyond worth it. The product is great for beginners or if you're extremely particular with details of makeup. The smaller size makes it easy to use. Also, I personally love the eco brand for makeup brushes as well so this is a perfect addition.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: 👌
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as other's but it does what's it's suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Softest Beauty Blender
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing and affordable. The beauty blender seamlessly melts the foundation into the skin. I would recommend using medium amount of product and working your way, let the face absorb the foundation for a natural finish. For a full face finish, layering is your best friend and let the beauty blender work it into the skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Clark

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: at first i wasn’t sure how to feel about them but they are ok. not the best but not horrible either.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Yes. Who needs those expensive ones? Not me. These work just fine
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: This is touted as better than BeautyBlender. It’s not! The texture is hard and pulls at delicate undereye skin even when moistened. As I cannot return it I will toss. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Iamjaxx

customer_reviews.title: Good sponges at reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sponges. I love the eco tools brand in general but these are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Somer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This makeup sponge is super super soft and makes my makeup application so fast and easy to apply :)
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Loved and would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love these and would buy again since they are eco friendly, but it is a bit hard to clean the makeup off.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and spongy
customer_reviews.text: Super soft sponge can’t wait to use. Handle is nice too
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Caldieraro

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use . Can’t apply any pressure . Stick with regular beauty blender
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic! The big one is great for foundation
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! The big one is great for foundation, and the little one is perfect for concealer and under the eyes. I have extremely dry skin, and these do a great job at applying foundation without drying me out or causing me to flake.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sponges for the best price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sponges for the best price!!! Feels amazing on skin and doesn’t soak up hardly any of the product. Does a phenomenal job blending/moving product.
customer_reviews.author: mpw

customer_reviews.title: better than the beauty blender
customer_reviews.text: I love this sponge, easy to clean easy to use and a fraction of the price. Since you need replace beauty sponges every 3 to 6 months (more like 3 mos) this sponge has the right price point without sacrificing quality
customer_reviews.author: Yesi B

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for applying all the liquid make up.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Adriaan

customer_reviews.title: These sponges are a great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: These sponges are a great deal for the price! I wanted to replace my beauty blender with a blending sponge that was cheaper but still a great product. The smaller one is more dense, even when wet. I feel like it doesn't soak up as much makeup, but it is also a little more difficult to clean all of the makeup out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean with running water and soap
customer_reviews.text: I'm using everyday to apply my facial sunscreen and foundation, after the use I always wash with soap and water. Very useful for oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqueline Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. No color bleeding, very soft, best used wet. The smaller one is a little more stiff than the larger one, but still works all the same. Will continue to buy these as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These blenders are supper soft and easy to use and they blended my foundation perfectly. The smaller one is slightly more dense than the large one but both work very well. The large one is easy to clean but the smaller one was more difficult to remove the foundation and appears to have left a stain. Regardless of that I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Abbygale Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Great brand not so much the Blenders
customer_reviews.text: Well right now after a month looking for another Blender to buy, this one does not have the best quality, love the Brand not the Blender
customer_reviews.author: Sil

customer_reviews.title: this is a perfect sponge. I used to use the real technique ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a perfect sponge. I used to use the real technique orange beauty sponge and liked it but I love this one much more. There is also the added benefit that this is cruelty free and vegan. For the money, definitely give this a try. I will be ordering a new pair soon!
customer_reviews.author: Vaishnavi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was described
customer_reviews.text: These work well and are easy to clean. Description was very accurate and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I really love the shape of this applicator it gets into the hard to reach areas with precision. The wooden handle really makes things easier.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these sponges
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased eco tools sponges before and will continue to only buy these sponges.i have tried the beauty blender but these sponges work just as well and are a much better price point. They are so soft and only get better when you wet them with warm water.
customer_reviews.author: kayla herb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These sponges do not stand up to a washing, that's the drawback.
customer_reviews.author: (ab)

customer_reviews.title: Flower Beauty's blender is WAY better but these do the job
customer_reviews.text: Flower Beauty's blender is WAY better but these do the job. The small one does not expand much when wet, but the green one does a decent amount. I wish they were both a wee bit squishier.
customer_reviews.author: Awb0424

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good blender, just dense so its difficult to clean completely
customer_reviews.author: Bri

product_meta.title: EcoTools Perfecting Blender Duo, 2 Beauty Sponges for Flawless Foundation Coverage
product_meta.description: Style Name:Perfecting Blender DuoThe Perfecting Blender Duo is designed with EcoFoam Technology in two sizes and densities to create a camera ready look. The Large Base Blender is soft and flexible to create light, buildable makeup application. The Mini Detail Blender is firmer for more precise and detailed coverage. We've always believed in the power of beauty. At EcoTools we encourage you to embrace your own individual meaning of beauty and share it with the world, whether it is makeup tutorials, an inspirational story or giving back to the community. Because when you feel truly beautiful, you will make the world and everyone around you feel beautiful! Armed with a mission to make women look beautiful on the outside and feel just as good on the inside, sisters Jen and Stacey set out to create a brush collection that was not only nature friendly, but chic, high-quality, and affordable too. After sourcing recycled materials, renewable bamboo and better manufacturing processes, in 2007, EcoTools was born. This year, we’re celebrating EcoTools’ 10th anniversary by introducing a fresh new look, brushes that feel even better in your hands, and packaging with detailed tutorials that make it easier than ever to create a beautiful look from hair to toe. We’re also marking a decade of living beautifully by making a $100,000 donation to Glamour’s The Girl Project via our #MyTrueBeauty campaign that supports women’s empowerment and encourages women to become the best version of themselves. We believe in giving a new purpose to old things. That’s why our products are made from recycled aluminum and plastic. Our packaging is made of 100% Tree-Free paper. HOW? With 20% cotton and 80% bamboo fibers! The handles on our products are made of renewable bamboo, one of the fastest growing plants on the planet!
feature_bullets: Designed with EcoFoam Technology in two sizes and densities to create a camera ready look.
The Large Base Blender is soft & flexible to create light
buildable makeup application. The Mini Detail Blender is firmer for more precise and detailed coverage.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
